channel.title: How Do You Get 5 000 000 exp?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "How Do You Get 5 000 000 exp?"

item.title: Re: How Do You Get 5 000 000 exp?
item.content:encoded: Mister Tea doesn't work that way. You need to take him on missions, not just switch him in at the end of the day. Also, Mister Tea cannot be acquired in season one.

item.title: Re: How do you get 5,000,000 exp?
item.content:encoded: Change the title to How do you get 5,000,000 exp? because right now it looks more of a "How To" than a "How Do You?"

item.title: Re: How to get 5 000 000 exp
item.content:encoded:
It's mainly a lot of stamina + a lot of money + items (2 Silver Elixir, Go Piece, Captains Jackett, Letter of Marque), themes and allies that give you % on XP when doing missions. If you manage A-ranks with Pandabaer, Timmy lvl2 and Pinky lvl2 on your team and have some 800-1000 stamina (Hairpin mission, 250 sparring=200 stamina, 7-days-bonus, +100 stamina for referrals) fights that day and hang out with anonymous, you'll get easily more than 2 million XP when doing the right missions.
Then you throw some parties and change your team to Mr. Tea, who gives you an additional +50% on tomorrow's ranking points (if I'm not misinformed) and the Arena Favourite item gives you an additional 15%.

item.title: Re: How to get 5 000 000 exp
item.content:encoded: I wish i knew how someone can do that muchâ€¦..

item.title: How to get 5 000 000 exp
item.content:encoded:
I noticed that:

Top 5 Sannin:
1. Ashrafel - 5829170

And yesterday no 1 had 4 million exp.

How can you get this?

I can do 1.5 probably, maybe even 2 mil if I plan everything right. But with changes to hairpin pieces(reducing to one a day) I can not think a way to get so much experience.
